mapper.insert: insert into memberreview(memberreview_num, party_num, user_num, writer_num, content, rated) values(mre_sequence.nextval, #{partyNum}, #{userNum}, #{writerNum}, #{content}, #{rated})
mapper.update: update memberreview set content=#{content}, rated=#{rated}, wdate=sysdate where memberreview_num=#{memberreviewNum}
